title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM5 - Objective

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? 1. It is being implemented by Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment. 2. Scheme focuses on promoting silver economy through an open invitation on a portal namely SACRED. 3. Under scheme Government aims to promote silver economy by providing upto ₹2 crore as financial assistance through equity participation.
options: Only 1 and 3
Only 1
Only 2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?
1. National Action Plan for Senior Citizen (NAPSrc) had been revamped, renamed as Atal VayoAbhyuday Yojana (AVYAY) and subsumed in April 2020.
2. Scheme includes the facets of safety/protection and general wellbeing of the elderly by awareness generation and sensitization of the society.
3. Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana (PMVVY) is a sub-scheme under the scheme which is a scheme for providing physical Aids and Assisted living devices to Senior Citizens.
options: (A) Only 1 and 3
(B) Only 3
(C) Only 1
(D) 1, 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Above scheme provides for IT portal for purpose of bringing employment seeker senior citizens and employment providers together, what is name of the portal?
options: (A) AGRASR
(B) SAGE
(C) SACRED
(D) ASPIRE
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?
1. It aims at constructing 1.95 crore PMAY-G houses with all basic amenities. 2. The funding under the scheme is shared between the Centre and States in the ratio of 50:50 in plain areas. 3. Through loan, the beneficiary can tap into additional funds to the tune of Rs 70,000 for completion of house.
 4. Allotment of house is made in the name of wife except in case of widow, unmarried and separate person.
options: Only 1
Only 1 and 2
Only 1 and 3
Only 3
Only 2 and 4

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?
1. The scheme was launched in 2015.
2. Beneficiaries identified using information from Socio Economic and Caste Census (SECC) subject to 15 point exclusion criteria which is to be verified by the Gram Sabhas.
3. Earlier timeline was till 2022 which has now been extended to March, 2025.
4. Convergence for piped drinking water, electricity connection, LPG gas connection etc. different Government programmes are also to be attempted.
options: (A) Only 1 and 2
(B) Only 2 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 3
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are correct in reference to Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Rural (PMAY-R)?

1. Minimum size of house (including a dedicated area for hygienic cooking) is 25 sq. mt.

2. There is provision of assistance for toilets construction - Rs. 12000 though convergence with Swachh Bharat Mission-Gramin, MGNREGS etc.

3. A compendium of region-specific house designs with the name ‘Awas Vaani’ which includes house designs from various housing zones in various States has been published by the Ministry.

4. Beneficiaries are provided financial Assistance Rs. 1.20 lakh in hilly States (including North Eastern States and UTs of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh), difficult areas and Integrated Action Plan (IAP) districts.
options: (A) Only 1 and 2
(B) Only 1 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 4
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) Only 1 and 4

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?

1. Scheme aims to provide one hot cooked meal in Government and Private schools from 2021-22 to 2026-27.

2. The scheme is being implemented by Ministry of Rural Development.

3.TithiBhojan which  is a community participation programme in which people provide special food to children on special occasions/festivals to be promoted.
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: What is the total financial outlay under the above scheme?
options: Rs. 54061.73 crores
Rs. 110794.90 crore
Rs. 120794.90 crore
Rs. 130794.90 crore
Rs. 24918.35 crore

quiz.text: Which statement(s) among the following is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?1. All school children studying in Classes I-VIII are covered under the scheme.2. All Students studying in pre-primary or Balvatikas are also covered under scheme.3. Scheme promotes use of locally grown traditional food items for a fillip to local economic growth.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 1 and 2
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: What is the name of insurance scheme being offered as part of the Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)?
options: Fishers Accident Insurance scheme
Blue Revolution Insurance scheme
Group Accident Insurance scheme
Fisheries and allied Insurance scheme
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following are intended beneficiaries under the Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)? 1. Ramesh, who belongs to Other Backward Classes. 2. Vinay who is a Individual Entrepreneurs. 3. Prayas, which is a Self Help Groups (SHGs).
options: 1 and 3
1 and 2
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following works will be included for execution under the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)? A. Individual Assets for Vulnerable Sections B. Private Works Relating to Natural Resources Management C. Common Infrastructure for National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM) Compliant Self-Help Groups.
options: Only A
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
A and B

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Strengthening Teaching-Learning and Results for States (STARS) Project?

1. It is carved out of Samagra Shiksha, with a focus on those elements of scheme that will most directly support school education enhancement.

2. At National Level it supports Ministry of Education (MOE) efforts to establish a PARAKH (Performance Assessment, Review, and Analysis of Knowledge for Holistic Development).

3. STARS project includes a Contingency Emergency Response Component (CERC) under the State Component which would enable it to be more responsive to any natural, man-made and health disasters.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with respect to the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)?
options: Life insurance cover of Rs. 30,000 is provided to account holders
Age limit for availing OD (overdraft) facility has been revised from 18-60 years to 18-65 years
Accidental insurance cover for new RuPay card holders has been raised from Rs 1 lakh to Rs 5 lakh
No requirement to maintain any minimum balance in the accounts
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following are the key components in Foundational Literacy and Numeracy Mission under National Initiative for Proficiency in Reading with Understanding and Numeracy (NIPUN) Bharat Mission?

1. Decoding

2. Concept about print

3. Phonological Awareness

4. Measurements
options: 1, 2 and 3
2, 3 and 4
1, 3 and 4
1, 2 and 4
All of the above

quiz.text: Which the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to Special Assistance to States for Capital Investment 2023-24 Scheme?A. It provides special assistance to State Governments in form of 50-year interest free loan during financial year 2023-24.B. Scheme for financial assistance to States for capital investment/expenditure, first instituted in 2021-22 in wake of COVID-19 Pandemic.C. Funds for meeting State share of Jal Jeevan Mission and Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana have also been provided to States under this scheme.
options: A and B
Only A
B and C
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: What is nature & duration of support under the VAIBHAV Fellowships scheme?
options: For 4-5 months each year for a period of 2 years
For 1-2 months each year for a period of 3 years
For 1-2 months each year for a period of 5 years
For 5-6 months each year for a period of 3 years
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the MSME Competitive (LEAN) Scheme? A. Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises is the nodal ministry for the scheme. B. It was launched in the year 2023. C. It aims to enhance MSME's productivity, efficiency, and competitiveness by reduction of wastages in processes, inventory management, space management, energy consumption, etc.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Vivad Se Vishwas scheme?

A. In case of payment of tax, a taxpayer would be required to pay only the amount of the disputed taxes and will get complete waiver of interest, penalty and prosecution provided he/she pays by March 31, 2021.

B. Once a dispute is resolved, the designated authority can levy interest or penalty in relation to that dispute.

C. Appellate forum can make a decision in relation to the matter of dispute once it is resolved.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023), the Global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) was released by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and the Oxford Poverty and Human Development Initiative (OPHI). Consider the following statements regarding the “Global Multidimensional Poverty Index”.A. In 2005/2006, about 645 million people were in multidimensional poverty in India.B. In 2015/2016 this number declined to about 370 million.C. In 2019/2021 this number raised to about 490 million.Which of the above statement is incorrect?
options: Only A
Both A and C
Only B
Only C
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023), the Global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) was released by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and the Oxford Poverty and Human Development Initiative (OPHI). Consider the following statements regarding the “Global Multidimensional Poverty Index”.A. Nearly 2/3rd of all poor people (730 million people) live in Low income countriesB. Middle-income countries constitute only 10% of the population (387 million) included in the MPIC. Children under the age of 18 account for 1/2 of MPI-poor people (566 million)Which of the above statement is incorrect?
options: Only A
Both A and B
Only C
Both C and B
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023) International Organization for Migration (IOM) released a report titled “From Evidence to Action: Twenty Years of IOM Child Trafficking Data to Inform Policy and Programming”. Consider the following statements regarding the data given in the report.A. The report noted that no age range is immune to child trafficking.B. Child victims ranged from 0 to 18 years old.C. Most of the child victims of trafficking (90%) were being trafficked for forced labour (mainly boys)Which of the following statements are correct?
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), International Maritime Organization (IMO) has adopted revised strategy to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from international shipping. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to key features of new strategy?1.      An enhanced common ambition to reach net-zero GHG emissions from international shipping close to 2050.2.      A commitment to ensure an uptake of alternative zero and near-zero GHG fuels by 2030.3.      To reduce the total annual GHG by at least 70%, striving for 80%, by 2040, compared to 2008.
options: 1 and 2
3 only
2 only
2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), UN has introduced 51 robots at AI summit to advance Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to SDGs? 1.   SDGs comprises of 17 goals and 169 targets. 2.   India’s performance towards SDG is evaluated based on National Indicator Framework (NIF). 3.   NIF is developed by Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation.
options: 2 only
1 only
2 and 3
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Ministry of Coal has set a target to achieve coal gasification of __________ coal by _________ reflecting the government’s commitment to harnessing the power of coal gasification.
options: 50 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
200 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2025
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2027

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, Department of Telecommunication has announced the formation of the Bharat 6G Alliance (B6GA). A grant of ________ under the Telecom Technology Development Fund (TTDF) has been allocated to support the advancement of 6G technology.
options: Rs 240.51 crores
Rs 540.51 crores
Rs 440.51 crores
Rs 340.51 crores
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Prime Minister has launched the National Sickle Cell Anaemia Elimination Mission in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh.Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to National Sickle Cell Anaemia Elimination Mission?1.      Target year to eliminate sickle cell Anaemia is 2027.2.      4 Main components of the Mission are Screening, Prevention, Treatment and Research.3.      Sickle Cell Anaemia is a genetic disorder that affects the shape and function of white blood cells (WBCs).4.      Mission has a target of screening approximately 7.0 crore people under 40 years of age in the next 3 years (from the fiscal year 2023-24 to 2025-26).
options: 1 and 4
2 and 4
2 and 3
1, 2, 3 and 4
Only 4

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Ministry of Power has granted waiver of Inter-State Transmission System (ISTS) charges to ____________ commissioned on or before _________ for a period of _________ from the date of commissioning of the Project.
options: Off-shore wind power projects; 31st December, 2032; 25 years
On-shore wind power projects; 31st December 2030; 25 years
Green Hydrogen/Green Ammonia projects; 31st December 2032; 20 years
Off-shore wind power projects; 31st December, 2032; 20 years
Off-shore wind power projects; 31st December, 2030; 25 years

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the World Bank’s Board of Executive Directors has approved __________ in financing to accelerate India’s development of low-carbon energy.
options: USD 1 billion
USD 2.5 billion
USD 2 billion
USD 5 billion
USD 1.5 billion

quiz.text: The Action Taken Report (ATR) Module of AuditOnline has recently (July 2023) been launched by the ___________________.
options: Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Panchayati Raj (MoPR)
Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Commerce & Industry
Ministry of Corporate Affairs
